channel.title: Broward County Public Schools HRD Professional Development for Teachers
channel.description: HRD coordinatates quality professional development for all staff members within the Broward County Public Schools district, as well as providing support to charter schools with Broward County. The department works with staff developers and designers in various departments to ensure quality and standards in the area of professional development.

image.title: Broward County Public Schools HRD Professional Development

channel.itunes:author: District Webmaster
channel.itunes:keywords: K - 12 Education, Broward, Broward County, Public Schools, Broward County Public Schools, Training

item.description: BCPS HRD Update PD13.PLC_Facilitation.m4v:The following conversation took place among Teacher Leaders after reading the article, "Who Cares About Facilitation?" item.title: T43.Fluency.m4v
item.description: BCPS HRD Update T43.Fluency:Fluency is the ability to read quickly, accurately, and with appropriate expression. Reciting a play during a reading group is one way these students practice reading with expression. (1:57).

item.title: T37.Consultancy
item.description: BCPS HRD Update Consultancy (A Glimpse): A Consultancy is a structured process for helping an individual or small group of people think more expansively about a particular, concrete problem or dilemma. Participants from HRD's Instructional Coach Professional Development event explain and model parts of this process (4:45).
item.itunes:author: Human Resources Department
item.itunes:subtitle: BCPS HRD Update T37.Consultancy

item.title: Collaborative Conversations #T35
item.description: BCPS HRD Update 35- Collaborative Conversations:¬¨‚Ä†Plantation Elementary‚Äö√Ñ√¥s New Educators and Instructional Coaches routinely get together to discuss current classroom practices. This session is using the HRD podcast on Learning Stations in the High School to generate discussion on their classroom centers. This collegial conversation pulls on teacher experiences and best practices.

item.title: InductionAir_1
item.description: BCPS HRD Update InductionAir_1:¬¨‚Ä†An introduction to the Continuous Improvement Plan (CIP) for coaching: Developing your Instructional Coach. This podcast will describe each step and explain how an Instructional Coach can use this tool to support a New Educator. The 7 sections of the CIP include: Desired State, Assessment, Current Reality, Goals, Support/ Interventions, Impact and Next Steps. (10:32)
item.itunes:author: Human Resources Department
item.itunes:subtitle: BCPS HRD Update InductionAir_1.

item.title: Induction Planning #T24
item.description: BCPS HRD Update 24- Induction Planning: How has your support plan identified ways to prepare your replacement? item.itunes:summary: BCPS HRD Update 22- Elementary Social Skills: A pre-K teacher describes and demonstrates the use of teaching social skills to ensure learning. Our twenty second podcast includes information on an elementary social skills in a K classroom.

item.title: Elementary Team Teaching #T21
item.description: BCPS HRD Update 21- Elementary Team Teaching: Team Teaching occurs when two or more professionals jointly deliver substantive instruction to a diverse or blended group of students.
item.itunes:author: Human Resources Department
item.itunes:subtitle: BCPS HRD Update 21 -Elementary Team Teaching # T21.
item.itunes:summary: BCPS HRD Update 21- Elementary Team Teaching: Team Teaching occurs when two or more professionals jointly deliver substantive instruction to a diverse or blended group of students. A group of three first grade teachers demonstrate and discuss how team teaching is used to meet the individual needs of sixty elementary students. Our twenty first podcast includes information on an elementary team teaching demonstration and discussion.
